functions.example: وتعذر لمتحدثة باسم وزارة الدفاع الالمانية ان تؤكد [اليوم السبت] هذه المعلومات.
functions.exampleen: A spokeswoman for the German Ministry of Defense was unable to confirm this information [on Saturday].

functions.example: برلين ترفض حصول [شركة] اميركية على رخصة تصنيع دبابة ليوبارد الالمانية
functions.exampleen: Berlin refuses [an American company] to obtain a license to manufacture the German Leopard tank

functions.example: ولا يزال ثلاثة ماليزيين وفرنسيان والمانيان ولبنانية تحمل الجنسية الفرنسية و[جنوب] افريقيان وفنلنديان وفيليبيان محتجزين لدى مجموعة ابي سياف منذ قرابة اربعة اشهر في جزيرة جولو.
functions.exampleen: Three Malaysians, two Frenchmen, two Germans, a Lebanese woman with French citizenship, two [South] Africans, two Finns, and two Filipinos have been detained by the Abu Sayyaf group for nearly four months on Jolo Island.

functions.example: وتتهم بغداد باستمرار الولايات المتحدة وبريطانيا بتجميد عقود المنتجات الغذائية والادوية وكذلك عقود قطع الغيار الضرورية للصناعة النفطية المتضررة [اثناء حرب الخليج في 1991].
functions.exampleen: Baghdad accuses the United States and Britain of continuing to freeze contracts for food products and medicines, as well as contracts for necessary spare parts for the damaged oil industry [during the Gulf War in 1991].

functions.example: وتشهد طهران او المناطق الاخرى يوميا تجمعات لعمال لم يتلقوا رواتبهم منذ سنة احيانا، [امام مقار الوزارات والهيئات المعنية].
functions.exampleen: Tehran or other regions witness daily gatherings of workers who have not received their salaries for a year, sometimes, [in front of the headquarters of the relevant ministries and bodies].

functions.example: و[أن] يحفظه ويحميه من أية آثار أو نكسات.
functions.exampleen: And [to] preserve and protect it from any effects or setbacks.

functions.example: وافادت البحرية الروسية ان الغواصة مجهزة ب24 صاروخا الا [ان ايا منها لا يملك رأسا نوويا].
functions.exampleen: The Russian Navy reported that the submarine is equipped with 24 missiles, [but none of them has a nuclear warhead].

functions.example: وكان الشيخ حمد زار اليمن الاسبوع الماضي ثم السودان واريتريا اللذين يسعى للتقريب بينهما [اثر تدهور علاقاتهما].
functions.exampleen: Sheikh Hamad visited Yemen last week, then Sudan and Eritrea, which he seeks to bring closer together [following the deterioration of their relations].

functions.example: وطغت احداث الشغب على اجواء المباراة، [اذ اشتبك لاعبو المنتخبين فيما بينهم عقب نهايتها لدقائق عدة].
functions.exampleen: Riots dominated the atmosphere of the match, [as the players of the two teams clashed among themselves after the end for several minutes].

functions.example: وقال ان عملية اجلاء البحارة بالمعنى الدقيق لن تبدأ قبل منتصف الليل في افضل الظروف [اذا استقرت الاحوال الجوية على هدوئها].
functions.exampleen: He said that the sailors' evacuation process, strictly speaking, would not begin before midnight under the best circumstances, [if the weather conditions remained calm].

functions.example: [ازاء هذه الحملة المزعومة ضد الارهاب]
functions.exampleen: [Regarding this alleged campaign against terrorism]

functions.example: وصلت وزيرة الخارجية الاميركية مادلين اولبرايت اليوم الثلاثاء [الى برازيليا] في اطار جولة على خمس دول في اميركا اللاتنية.
functions.exampleen: US Secretary of State Madeleine Albright arrived [in Brasilia] on Tuesday as part of a five-country tour of Latin America.

functions.example: وتجدر الإشارة [إلى أن الجيش الأمريكي فقد ما لا يقل عن 27 مروحية منذ غزوه العراق في مارس العام الماضي].
functions.exampleen: It should be noted [that the US Army has lost at least 27 helicopters since its invasion of Iraq in March last year].

functions.example: وتنتج منطقة بحر قزوين حاليا اقل من مليوني برميل نفط يوميا، وطبقا لأرقام وكالة الطاقة الاميركية فان إنتاج هذه المنطقة يمكن ان يتراوح إنتاجها [إلى بين 3.2 و4.9 مليون برميل يوميا وذلك في حدود عام 2010].
functions.exampleen: The Caspian Sea region currently produces less than two million barrels of oil per day, and according to US Energy Agency figures, the production of this region could range between 3.2 and 4.9 million barrels per day within the year 2010.

functions.example: يتوجه رئيس وزراء سنغافورة جون تشوك تونج غدا الاحد الى الولايات المتحدة فى زيارة رسمية لواشنطن للاجتماع مع القادة الامريكيين [الى جانب توقيع اتفاقية تجارة حرة امريكية سنغافورية] ، وفقا لما جاء فى بيان لمكتب رئيس الوزراء اليوم السبت.
functions.exampleen: Singapore Prime Minister John Chok Tong will head to the United States tomorrow, Sunday, on an official visit to Washington to meet with American leaders [in addition to signing a US-Singapore free trade agreement], according to a statement from the Prime Minister's Office on Saturday.

functions.example: وذلك لإعادة تصديرها [إلى خارج البلاد] بنسبة 100%.
functions.exampleen: This is to re-export it [outside the country] 100%.

functions.example: والى ذلك، فإن الاسرائيليين حينما يطالبون بوقف التعامل العسكري مع ايران يدركون ان ذلك يعني خسارة 300 - 400 مليون دولار سنوياً هي قيمة المبيعات الروسية من الأسلحة، في حين ان كل الميزان التجاري مع اسرائيل كان [الى قبل سنة واحدة] لا يتعدى 500 مليون دولار.
functions.exampleen: In addition, when the Israelis demand an end to military dealings with Iran, they realize that this means losing 300-400 million dollars annually, which is the value of Russian arms sales, while the entire trade balance with Israel [until one year ago] did not exceed 500 million dollars. .

functions.example: ومن المقرر ان تنجز الصفقة بحلول حزيران 2001 [إلا اذا لم تحصل على موافقة اللجنة الاتحادية للاتصالات].
functions.exampleen: The deal is scheduled to be completed by June 2001 [unless it obtains approval from the Federal Communications Commission].

functions.example: وقال [إنه] من المنتظر أن يبدأ تنفيذ المشروع خلال النصف الثاني من العام الجاري.
functions.exampleen: He said [that] the project is expected to begin implementation during the second half of this year.

functions.example: نحن على استعداد لتزويد الابناء فى العراق بما يحتاجونه [بناء على عقد مقدم ما] لم يجدوا البديل داخل النفط العراقى.
functions.exampleen: We are ready to provide the people in Iraq with what they need [based on a contract provided] unless they find an alternative within Iraqi oil.

functions.example: كما طلب منهم استخراج ايصال عند عودتهم الى الجنوب لاثبات انهم يقيمون فى فنادق [بدلا من منازل اقاربهم فى الشمال].
functions.exampleen: They were also asked to produce a receipt upon their return to the south to prove that they were staying in hotels [instead of the homes of their relatives in the north].

functions.example: وقالت شرطة مدينة كربلاء إن القتلى كانوا ضمن مجموعة انهت تدريباتها في الاردن، وكانوا في طريق عودتهم [بعد انتهاء دورتهم التدريبية].
functions.exampleen: Karbala city police said that the dead were part of a group that had completed its training in Jordan, and were on their way back [after completing their training course].

functions.example: وقدمت السعودية 550 مليون دولار من المساعدات الى البوسنه [بينها] 120 مليونا من المساعدة المباشرة الى حكومتها.
functions.exampleen: Saudi Arabia provided USD550 million in aid to Bosnia, [including] USD120 million in direct aid to its government.

functions.example: وصل وزير الخارجية الامريكي كولن باول [بعيد ظهر] اليوم السبت الى بيروت قادما من سوريا، لاجراء محادثات مع المسؤولين اللبنانيين تتمحور حول ازمة الشرق الاوسط.
functions.exampleen: US Secretary of State Colin Powell arrived [afternoon] today, Saturday, in Beirut, coming from Syria, to hold talks with Lebanese officials centered around the Middle East crisis.

functions.example: وسيتم بناء المنظار الذي يطلق عليه اسم سالت (ساوث افركان لارج تيليسكوب) [بقطر 11 متر]ا.
functions.exampleen: The telescope, called SALT (South African Large Telescope), will be built [with a diameter of 11 metres].

functions.example: يعقد مجلس الأعمال المصري ـ الشرق أفريقي اجتماعاً في القاهرة، يوم 15/2 الحالي، بمشاركة عدد من المسؤولين وسفراء دول شرق أفريقيا من كل من كينيا، تنزانيا، جيبوتي، أثيوبيا، زامبيا، رواندا وبوروندي، [بالإضافة إلى مصر].
functions.exampleen: The Egyptian-East African Business Council will hold a meeting in Cairo, on February 15, with the participation of a number of officials and ambassadors of East African countries from Kenya, Tanzania, Djibouti, Ethiopia, Zambia, Rwanda and Burundi, [in addition to Egypt].

functions.example: في اطار الحملة العالمية لمكافحة السيدا ولمناسبة اليوم العالمي الذي يصادف في الاول من كانون الاول المقبل وعنوانه الوصمة والتمييز، نظم البرنامج الوطني لمكافحة الايدز (السيدا) [بالتعاون مع الجمعيات الاهلية والوزارات ومنظمات الامم المتحدة المعنية] معرض السيدا في نقابة اطباء لبنان في فرن الشباك.
functions.exampleen: Within the framework of the global campaign to combat AIDS and on the occasion of the World Day, which falls on the first of next December, and is titled Stigma and Discrimination, the National Program to Combat AIDS (AIDS) organized [in cooperation with civil society organizations, ministries and relevant United Nations organizations] an AIDS exhibition at the Lebanese Medical Association in Furn El Chebbak.

functions.example: و[بالتوازي مع ذلك]، تخطط واشنطن لفرض نوع من العزلة الاقتصادية على سوريا وإيران وبالتحديد إغلاق السوق الاستثمارية العراقية بوجه الدولتين باعتبارهما تتبنيان مواقف مناهضة للتواجد العسكري الأمريكي في العراق.
functions.exampleen: [In parallel with this], Washington is planning to impose a kind of economic isolation on Syria and Iran, specifically closing the Iraqi investment market in the face of the two countries as they adopt positions opposed to the American military presence in Iraq.

functions.example: فتحول الاعوان الى المستشفى واستمعوا لاقوال المتضرر بعد استقرار حالته الصحية فأشار الى انه كان يتمشى [بالقرب من طابية هندي] احدى الضيعات الكائنة بجهة بئر شلوف باحواز نابل عندما فوجئ بشخص يطلق باتجاهه عيارا ناريا فتسبب في اصابته في مكان حساس.
functions.exampleen: The officers went to the hospital and listened to the victim’s statements after his health condition stabilized. He indicated that he was walking [near Tabiya Hindi], one of the villages located in the Bir Shalouf region of Ahvaz, Nabul, when he was surprised by a person firing a bullet at him, wounding him in a sensitive place.

functions.example: ومن جهة أخرى أعلن الشرقاوي حفني رئيس جهاز التمثيل التجاري أن الصادرات المصرية إلى لبنان خلال عام 2003 قد شهدت زيادة ملحوظة [بالمقارنة بعام 2002].
functions.exampleen: On the other hand, Al-Sharqawi Hafni, head of the Commercial Representation Authority, announced that Egyptian exports to Lebanon during 2003 witnessed a noticeable increase [compared to 2002].

functions.example: أما العامل الآخر فهو الظروف الاقتصادية غير المناسبة هذا العام [بالنسبة لعدد ممن كانوا يقيمون هذه الموائد، خاصة من رجال الأعمال].
functions.exampleen: The other factor is the unsuitable economic conditions this year [for a number of those who were hosting these tables, especially businessmen].

functions.example: قام تساو ، وهو ايضا عضو المكتب السياسى للجنة المركزية للحزب الشيوعى الصينى وعضو مجلس الدولة ، بالزيارة [بالنيابة عن جيانغ تسه مين] رئيس اللجنة العسكرية المركزية وقادة اللجنة الاخرين .
functions.exampleen: Cao, also a member of the Political Bureau of the Communist Party of China Central Committee and a member of the State Council, paid the visit [on behalf of Jiang Zemin], Chairman of the Central Military Commission, and other leaders of the committee.

functions.example: نظر[يا وبالاعتماد على] الحسابات الفلكية وعلى ما تقرر في مؤتمر اسطمبول فان رؤية الهلال في اي بلد من البلدان الاسلامية قبل انتصاف ليلة يوم الرصد يمكن من الاعلان عن دخول الشهر في الدول الاسلامية غير ان هذا القرار ظل حبرا على ورق.
functions.exampleen: In view, and relying on astronomical calculations and what was decided at the Istanbul Conference, the sighting of the crescent in any Islamic country before midnight on the day of observation enables the announcement of the beginning of the month in Islamic countries, but this decision remained a dead letter.

functions.example: وقتل ولدان ذبحا الاحد في الحطاطبة قرب تيبازه على يد مجموعة اسلامية مسلحة فر عناصرها [باتجاه غابة قريبة] على ما ذكرت صحيفة لو كوتيديان دوران.
functions.exampleen: Two boys were slaughtered on Sunday in Al-Hatatba, near Tipaza, by an armed Islamic group whose members fled [towards a nearby forest], according to what Le Quotidien Durand newspaper reported.

functions.example: واضاف ان القمة [باستثناء حكومة الكونغو] تجدد دعمها للمنسق كيتوميلي ماسيري الذي عينته منظمة الوحدة الافريقية ورفضته كينشاسا.
functions.exampleen: He added that the summit [with the exception of the Congolese government] renews its support for coordinator Ketumile Masire, who was appointed by the Organization of African Unity and rejected by Kinshasa.

functions.example: تولى صدام السلطة [باسم التحديث والتنمية والحرية]، وفعل ما فعله.
functions.exampleen: Saddam took power [in the name of modernization, development and freedom], and he did what he did.

functions.example: وقالت إدارة الإعلام في المكتبة إنه تم سحب الكتاب من خزانة المعرض [باعتبار أن عرضه يمثل اختياراً غير صائب، ويفتقر للذوق العام].
functions.exampleen: The library's media department said that the book was withdrawn from the exhibition's closet [on the grounds that its display represented an incorrect choice and lacked public taste].

functions.example: العراق يفرج عن اثنين من الاميركيين بعد سجنهما 113 يوما [بتهمة عبور الحدود العراقية الكويتية بطريقة غير شرعية].
functions.exampleen: Iraq releases two Americans after being imprisoned for 113 days [on charges of illegally crossing the Iraqi-Kuwaiti border].

functions.example: وأوضح أن القطاع الخاص يستورد احتياجاته المطلوبة من الأقطان [بجانب شراء كميات من الإنتاج المحلي].
functions.exampleen: He explained that the private sector imports its required cotton needs [in addition to purchasing quantities of local production].

functions.example: ودعا صالح الى ان تكون هناك مراجعة جدية للسياسة العربية [بخصوص العراق] طوال الفترة الماضية، مؤكدا على ضرورة استيعاب دروس الماضى لمنع تكرار الكارثة التى حلت بالعراق.
functions.exampleen: Saleh called for there to be a serious review of Arab policy [regarding Iraq] throughout the past period, stressing the necessity of absorbing the lessons of the past to prevent a recurrence of the disaster that befell Iraq.

functions.example: فالسوق المصري يوجد فيه أربعة أسعار مختلفة للدولار، فلدينا سعر السوق السوداء وسعر شركات الصرافة وسعر البنوك [بخلاف سعر الدولار الجمركي].
functions.exampleen: The Egyptian market has four different prices for the dollar. We have the black market price, the exchange company price, and the bank price [other than the customs dollar price].

functions.example: وخلال شهر وعشرات الاجتماعات لاحزاب سياسية ودينية بلغ عددها 72 حزبا جاء معظم قادتها من الخارج [برفقة الدبابات الامريكية]
functions.exampleen: During a month and dozens of meetings of 72 political and religious parties, most of their leaders came from abroad [accompanied by American tanks].

functions.example: وكانت عملية اجلاء طاقم الغواصة ارجئت منذ الاثنين [بسبب هبوب العاصفة].
functions.exampleen: The evacuation of the submarine crew had been postponed since Monday [due to the storm].

functions.example: قد تتعرض لبعض الصعاب مع رفيقك [بشأن الأمور العاطفية].
functions.exampleen: You may have some difficulties with your companion [about emotional matters].

functions.example: وكشفت المعطيات المتوفرة ان خافرة تابعة لجيش البحر كانت [بصدد] مراقبة سيلان الملاحة وحراسة المياه الاقليمية التونسية التابعة لمنطقة نفوذها عندما كشفت الة الرادار زورقا سريعا في موقع بالمياه الدولية.
functions.exampleen: Available data revealed that a sentry belonging to the Sea Army was [in the process of] monitoring the flow of navigation and guarding the Tunisian territorial waters belonging to its area of influence when the radar machine detected a speedboat in a location in international waters.

functions.example: لن تستطيع إرضاء من تعيش معهم [بصرف النظر عما تفعله هذا الأسبوع].
functions.exampleen: You won't be able to please the people you live with [no matter what you do this week].

functions.example: وانطلاقاً من هذه التجارب، اعتبرت أمريكا أنه من الأفضل بناء علاقات مباشرة مع دول عديدة، ولو كانت صغيرة جغرافيا، بدلا من حصر الاستثمار السياسي بدولة واحدة [بصفتها] الوكيل الحصري، إذ تبين أنه عند فشل أو سقوط أو تغير الوكيل تتضرر مصالح أمريكا الإقليمية على نحو واسع.
functions.exampleen: Based on these experiences, America considered it better to build direct relations with many countries, even if they were geographically small, rather than restricting political investment to one country [as] the exclusive agent, as it became clear that when the agent fails, falls, or changes, America’s regional interests are harmed. Broad grammar.

functions.example: ذكر النائب العام الاندونيسى ما راشمان فى بالو بوسط سولاويسى اليوم ان جميع المشتبه فيهم فى انفجارات فى بالى التى وقعت فى منتصف اكتوبر العام الماضى سيتم محاكمتهم فى دنباسار عاصمة مقاطعة بالى [بغض النظر عن المكان الذى تم القبض عليهم فيه].
functions.exampleen: Indonesian Attorney General Ma Rachman said in Palu, Central Sulawesi, today that all suspects in the explosions in Bali that occurred in mid-October last year will be tried in Denpasar, the capital of Bali province [regardless of where they were arrested].

functions.example: اعلن مسؤول روسي رفيع المستوى ان عمليات انقاذ طاقم الغواصة الروسية التي استقرت في قاع بحر بارنتس وعلى متنها 116 شخصا، يمكن ان تبدأ بعد ظهر اليوم الثلاثاء [بفضل تحسن الاحوال الجوية].
functions.exampleen: A high-ranking Russian official announced that rescue operations for the crew of the Russian submarine that settled at the bottom of the Barents Sea with 116 people on board could begin Tuesday afternoon [thanks to improved weather conditions].

functions.example: وفي نفس الاطار ايضا عقد مجلس هيئة الجمعية جلسة عمل مع اطارات البنك التونسي للتضامن [بقصد تمكين المحامين الشبان من الانتفاع بالقروض المقدمة من هذا البنك وقد]
functions.exampleen: In the same context, the association’s body council also held a working session with the executives of the Tunisian Solidarity Bank [with the intention of enabling young lawyers to benefit from the loans provided by this bank.]

functions.example: وفي اطار المؤتمر، اجريت بعد الظهر محاكمة رمزية لارييل شارون [بمشاركة قاض وشهود وهيئة محلفين ومحامين ووجوه سياسية واجتماعية].
functions.exampleen: Within the framework of the conference, a symbolic trial of Ariel Sharon was held in the afternoon [with the participation of a judge, witnesses, jury, lawyers, and political and social figures].

functions.example: واتفق الجانبان على توقيع بروتوكول للتعاون بين بورصتي مصر وجنوب أفريقيا يتم [بمقتضاه نقل الخبرات] والتكنولوجيا للبورصة المصرية وفتح خطوط مباشرة للتعاون بين البورصتين في اتجاه الربط بينهما.
functions.exampleen: The two sides agreed to sign a cooperation protocol between the Egyptian and South African stock exchanges, under which expertise and technology would be transferred to the Egyptian stock exchange, and direct lines of cooperation would be opened between the two stock exchanges towards linking them.

functions.example: ودعا كيم في كلمة القاها [بمناسبة الذكرى الخامسة والخمسين للتحرر من الاحتلال الياباني] الى وضع حد لخمسين عاما من الحرب الباردة في شبه الجزيرة الكورية.
functions.exampleen: In a speech he delivered [on the occasion of the fifty-fifth anniversary of liberation from Japanese occupation], Kim called for an end to fifty years of the Cold War on the Korean Peninsula.

functions.example: وقع لاعب منتخب ايران لكرة القدم كريم باقري عقدا انتقل [بموجبه الى صفوف تشارلتون الانكليزي من الدرجة الممتازة لمدة اربع سنوات مقابل 650 الف دولار].
functions.exampleen: Iranian national football team player Karim Bagheri signed a contract under which he moved to the English Premier League club Charlton for a period of four years for 650,000 dollars.

functions.example: ودعت مواقع أصولية أخرى عناصرها إلى التقليل من الجماع وأكل الكبسات [بهدف الإعداد لتنفيذ عمليات على ما يبدو].
functions.exampleen: Other fundamentalist websites called on their members to reduce sexual intercourse and eat capsules [apparently with the aim of preparing to carry out operations].

functions.example: Неколцина [измежду мълчаливите и невзрачни депутати] все пак се прочуха.

functions.example: Девойчето стоеше [като заковано].

functions.exampleen: For its historical and cultural reasons, Bulgaria does not really have as much mass emigration [as, for example, Russia after the revolution].

functions.example: Пожарът [край Бачково] пламна отново.

functions.example: Книгата е подарък за тебе [от нас].
functions.exampleen: The book is a gift for you [from us].

functions.example: Najednou [mi] začal ožívat telefon.

functions.exampleen: According to a genetic study of autosomal data, South Asian Roma ancestors come from northwest India.

functions.example: Stejně jdu [do vězení], snad to za to stálo.

functions.example: Znát datum stříhání prvního plátu by pomohlo ochránit stovky pracovních míst až [do roku 2035].

functions.example: Text nepatří [do oblasti literatury v dnešním slova smyslu].

functions.example: Il terreno che l'acqua copre quando essa è all'altezza dello sbocco del lago o dello stagno appartiene al proprietario del lago o dello stagno, [ancorché il volume dell'acqua venga a scemare].

functions.example: La legge n. 97 del 9 marzo 1971 che stanziava 5,7 miliardi dei 29,4 miliardi di lire messi a disposizione per le spese complessive delle attività spaziali nazionali subì i ritardi dell'iter legislativo e [anzichè essere distribuita nel triennio 1969-1971], venne impiegata per far fronte anche alle spese degli anni 1972 e 1973.
functions.exampleen: Law no. 97 of March 9, 1971, which allocated 5.7 billion of the 29.4 billion lire made available for the overall expenditure of national space activities, suffered delays in the legislative process and instead of being distributed in the three-year period 1969-1971, it was used to make also meet the expenses of the years 1972 and 1973.

functions.example: Le studentesse universitarie, ad esempio, sono molto più propense a scegliere materie umanistiche [anziché le cosiddette materie Stem (scienza, tecnologia, ingegneria e matematica)].

functions.example: Il Governo della Repubblica può promuovere la questione di legittimità costituzionale sugli statuti regionali [dinanzi alla Corte costituzionale] entro trenta giorni dalla loro pubblicazione.

functions.example: Esse possono tuttavia essere applicate oltre il periodo specificato nel primo comma [fino a che non siano adempiuti i pertinenti impegni].
functions.exampleen: However, they may be applied beyond the period specified in the first paragraph until the relevant commitments are fulfilled.

functions.example: Se in giudizio è stata fornita qualche prova della sussistenza in genere dei miglioramenti, all'enfiteuta compete la ritenzione del fondo [fino a quando non è soddisfatto il suo credito].
functions.exampleen: If any evidence has been provided in court that the improvements generally exist, the leaseholder is entitled to retention of the fund until his credit is satisfied.

functions.example: Più volte durante le conferenze Stato Regioni ci siamo resi conto che lo Stato cerca di estendersi [fin dove non dovrebbe].
functions.exampleen: Several times during the State Regions conferences we realized that the State tries to extend itself as far as it should.

functions.example: non credettero [fino in fondo] al progetto
functions.exampleen: They didn't belive until the end in the project

functions.example: Alla sua bottega studiarono [fra gli altri] Luca Signorelli e il Perugino.
functions.exampleen: Luca Signorelli and Perugino, among others, studied in his workshop.

functions.example: Trascorsero quattro anni [fuori casa].
functions.exampleen: They spent four years away from home.

functions.example: Oggi un albanese su due vive [fuori dai confini della Repubblica di Tirana].
functions.exampleen: Today, one in two Albanians lives outside the borders of the Republic of Tirana.

functions.example: È dovere e diritto dei genitori mantenere, istruire ed educare i figli, anche se nati [fuori del matrimonio].
functions.exampleen: It is the duty and right of parents to support and educate their children, even if born out of wedlock.

functions.example: Quando la tua presenza su Facebook aumenta [grazie alla combinazione di Pagine o eventi Facebook e inserzioni], il tuo messaggio pubblicitario può trasformarsi in un vero e proprio passa-parola, dal momento che gli amici degli utenti che hanno già stabilito una connessione con i tuoi prodotti visualizzeranno i tuoi contenuti.
functions.exampleen: When your presence on Facebook increases thanks to the combination of Facebook Pages or events and advertisements, your advertising message can turn into a real word of mouth, since the friends of users who have already established a connection with your products will display your content.

functions.example: Abbiamo voluto dimostrare che la vita, [grazie a una buona riabilitazione], può essere estremamente attiva.
functions.exampleen: We wanted to show that life, thanks to good rehabilitation, can be extremely active.

functions.example: La guerra europea [nell'ex Jugoslavia] è figlia di questo doppio tramonto.
functions.exampleen: The European war in the former Yugoslavia is the daughter of this double decline.

functions.example: Le disposizioni relative all'usufrutto si applicano, [in quanto compatibili], all'uso e all'abitazione.
functions.exampleen: The provisions relating to usufruct apply, insofar as they are compatible, to use and housing.

functions.example: Gli ossidi di azoto (NOx) e i composti organici volatili (VOC), emessi nell'atmosfera da molti processi naturali o antropici, vanno [incontro ad un complesso sistema di reazioni fotochimiche indotte dalla luce ultravioletta presente nei raggi del sole].
functions.exampleen: Nitrogen oxides (NOx) and volatile organic compounds (VOCs), emitted into the atmosphere by many natural or anthropic processes, undergo a complex system of photochemical reactions induced by the ultraviolet light present in the sun's rays.

functions.example: [L'art. 940 prevede un modo di acquisto della proprietà autonomo rispetto a quelli previsti dagli articoli precedenti, infatti in questo caso non è disciplinato un conflitto tra due proprietari ma un conflitto tra proprietà e lavoro.]
functions.exampleen: The art. 940 provides for an independent way of purchasing property with respect to those provided for in the previous articles, in fact in this case a conflict between two owners is not governed but a conflict between property and work.

functions.example: Signora presidente, mi permetta di farle [innanzi tutto] i miei complimenti per aver tenuto fede alla parola data.
functions.exampleen: Madam President, allow me first of all to congratulate you on keeping your word.

functions.example: È finito nel museo [insieme ad altre cose].
functions.exampleen: It ended up in the museum along with other things.

functions.example: A fine anno si sposterà al Carlo Felice di Genova, che l'ha coprodotta [insieme con il Festival salisburghese].
functions.exampleen: At the end of the year it will move to the Carlo Felice in Genoa, which co-produced it together with the Salzburg Festival.

functions.example: [Intorno al cenotafio eretto al centro del Parco della Pace] erano raccolte sessantamila persone.
functions.exampleen: Sixty thousand people gathered around the cenotaph erected in the center of the Peace Park.

functions.example: [Invece dei cereali] fiorisce la marijuana, di cui l'Albania è diventato il più importante produttore europeo.
functions.exampleen: Marijuana flourishes instead of cereals, of which Albania has become the most important European producer.

functions.example: L'opinione pubblica e la stampa ci accusano di essere latitanti [laddove invece siamo noi a finanziare gran parte delle iniziative nazionali].
functions.exampleen: Public opinion and the press accuse us of being fugitives whereas we are the ones who finance most of the national initiatives.

functions.example: Certe società hanno vissuto un'estate a ritmo frenetico e magari [lontano dall'Italia].
functions.exampleen: Some companies have experienced a hectic summer and perhaps far from Italy.

functions.example: Ha distanziato tutte le rivali [lungo i tornanti del celebre passo pirenaico].
functions.exampleen: He outdid all rivals along the hairpin bends of the famous Pyrenean pass.

functions.example: [Non è mai stato accertato chi volle la sua morte, ma i nemici che si era fatta erano molti.]
functions.exampleen: It has never been ascertained who wanted her death, but the enemies she had made were many.

functions.example: [Malgrado la limitazione], questa tecnica è in grado di rendere una vasta gamma di sensori radar inservibili.
functions.exampleen: Despite the limitation, this technique is capable of rendering a wide range of radar sensors useless.

functions.example: L'affrancazione si opera [mediante il pagamento di una somma risultante dalla capitalizzazione del canone annuo sulla base dell'interesse legale].
functions.exampleen: The redemption takes place through the payment of a sum resulting from the capitalization of the annual fee on the basis of legal interest.

functions.example: Nel 1987 l'economista Robert Solow lamentava che l'era informatica si manifestava dappertutto [meno che nelle statistiche sulla produttività].
functions.exampleen: In 1987, economist Robert Solow complained that the information age was manifesting itself everywhere except in productivity statistics.

functions.example: Ottimamente ha retto invece il cuore nuovo di Saverio Pallucca - alle spalle tre infarti, quattro by-pass, un trapianto cardiaco [meno di due anni] fa - nell'ultima edizione della famosa maratona di New York.
functions.exampleen: Instead, Saverio Pallucca's new heart held up very well - behind him three heart attacks, four by-passes, a heart transplant less than two years ago - in the latest edition of the famous New York marathon.

functions.example: Sono stati ritrovati sani e salvi cinque americani, che erano stati rapiti da una banda armata, [mentre si trovavano in una riserva del grande parco nazionale di Mikuni].
functions.exampleen: Five Americans were found safe and sound, who had been kidnapped by an armed gang, while they were in a reserve in the great Mikuni National Park.

functions.example: [Per l'attore inglese Michael Caine, i colleghi Richard Harris e Peter O'Toole sono degli ubriaconi mentre per Harris, Caine è un trombone flatulente.]
functions.exampleen: For British actor Michael Caine, colleagues Richard Harris and Peter O'Toole are drunkards while for Harris, Caine is a flatulent trombone.

functions.example: Così Lorenzo Baldi, suo [driver nonché scopritore], ha dovuto chiedere di congelare la situazione in attesa delle controanalisi.
functions.exampleen: So Lorenzo Baldi, his driver and discoverer, had to ask to freeze the situation pending counter-analyzes.

functions.example: Una quarantina di commercianti è riuscita a raccogliere i fondi necessari per affittare un luna park in Israele, [nonostante l'opposizione dei predicatori dalle moschee].
functions.exampleen: About forty traders managed to raise the necessary funds to rent an amusement park in Israel, despite the opposition of preachers from the mosques.

functions.example: Perché Matt il bello, [nonostante che i 32 anni siano vicini], ha la stessa faccia da adolescente ribelle di 15 anni fa.
functions.exampleen: Because handsome Matt, despite the fact that 32 is close, has the same rebellious teenage face he did 15 years ago.

functions.example: Un artista versatile e irrealizzato fu Diefenbach, [mai banale, nè oziosamente superfluo].
functions.exampleen: A versatile and unrealized artist was Diefenbach, never banal, nor idly superfluous.

functions.example: [Il proprietario del fondo inferiore non può impedire questo scolo, nè il proprietario del fondo superiore può renderlo più gravoso.]
functions.exampleen: The owner of the lower floor cannot prevent this drainage, nor can the owner of the upper floor make it more burdensome.

functions.example: [Nonni sparavano agli indiani o proteggevano la fattoria dai fuorilegge.]
functions.exampleen: Grandparents shot Indians or protected the farm from outlaws.

functions.example: Esse possono tuttavia essere applicate [oltre il periodo specificato nel primo comma] fino a che non siano adempiuti i pertinenti impegni.
functions.exampleen: However, they may be applied beyond the period specified in the first paragraph until the relevant commitments are fulfilled.

functions.example: [Oltre alle tinte unite], esistono bordure di diversi tipi, anche con suggestivi motivi a rilievo.
functions.exampleen: In addition to plain colors, there are borders of different types, even with suggestive relief motifs.

functions.example: Spesso, tra quei mobili per bene, [oltre che libri e spartiti] si scambiano anche scritti sovversivi e, soprattutto, idee nuove.
functions.exampleen: In addition to books and scores, subversive writings and, above all, new ideas are often exchanged among those fine furniture.

functions.example: Può trattarsi di [cattiva circolazione, di alimentazione scorretta, di intossicamento generale oltre che di vita troppo seduta].
functions.exampleen: It can be a question of poor circulation, incorrect nutrition, general intoxication as well as too much sitting.

functions.example: Va sviluppata la cooperazione tra le istituzioni europee [onde eliminare sovrapposizioni tra programmi diversi].
functions.exampleen: Cooperation between the European institutions must be developed in order to eliminate overlaps between different programs.

functions.example: Dal momento che il prodotto è prefinito, si possono eseguire anche pose controllate, ovvero [stabilire in anticipo quale direzione dare alle venature oppure scegliere la sfumatura di colore].
functions.exampleen: Since the product is pre-finished, it is also possible to carry out controlled laying, i.e. to establish in advance which direction to give to the veins or to choose the color shade.

functions.example: Signora presidente, vorrei richiamare l'attenzione su un caso che il parlamento segue da tempo, [ossia il caso di Alexander Nikitin].
functions.exampleen: Madam President, I would like to draw attention to a case that Parliament has been following for some time, namely the case of Alexander Nikitin.

functions.example: L'estradizione del cittadino può essere consentita soltanto [ove sia espressamente prevista dalle convenzioni internazionali].
functions.exampleen: The extradition of the citizen can be allowed only where it is expressly provided for by international conventions.

functions.example: Dal momento che il prodotto è prefinito, [si possono eseguire anche pose controllate, ovvero stabilire in anticipo quale direzione dare alle venature oppure scegliere la sfumatura di colore].
functions.exampleen: Since the product is pre-finished, it is also possible to carry out controlled laying, i.e. to establish in advance which direction to give to the veins or to choose the color shade.

functions.example: In ospedale a Bolzano e Merano sono stati ricoverati cinque escursionisti [per ustioni e alterazioni cardiache].
functions.exampleen: Five hikers were hospitalized in Bolzano and Merano for burns and heart problems.

functions.example: Signor presidente, se lei permette vorrei innanzi tutto congratularmi [per come, nel corso della discussione, ha effettuato il cambio della presidenza].
functions.exampleen: Mr President, if you allow, I would like first of all to congratulate you on how, during the debate, you have changed the presidency.

functions.example: Le sonorità non si discostano significativamente da quelle di Damage Done, [per cui diversi fan l'hanno ritenuto inferiore ad altri album].
functions.exampleen: The sounds do not differ significantly from those of Damage Done, for which several fans have considered it inferior to other albums.

functions.example: Tengo il cinema pronto [per quando sarà possibile].
functions.exampleen: I keep the cinema ready for when it is possible.

functions.example: Questo memorandum tuttavia, [per quanto ufficiosamente approvato dai Governi Italiano e Statunitense], avrebbe dovuto avere la definitiva approvazione del Ministro degli Affari Esteri e del Dipartimento di Stato degli USA.
functions.exampleen: This memorandum, however, although unofficially approved by the Italian and US Governments, should have had the final approval of the Minister of Foreign Affairs and the US State Department.

functions.example: Si rifiuterà [per via del test].
functions.exampleen: He will refuse because of the test.

functions.example: Il Comune non pulisce questi scarabocchi [perché i pittori li rifarebbero].
functions.exampleen: The Municipality does not clean up these scribbles because the painters would do them again.

functions.example: Le donne danno la scalata al potere in modo più diretto e dunque più ingenuo, [perciò finiscono con lo scannarsi tra di loro].
functions.exampleen: Women give the rise to power in a more direct and therefore more naive way, so they end up slaughtering each other.

functions.example: [Nemmeno lo 007 dell'Ufficio indagini l'ha visto, però sono stato sospeso per trenta giorni.]
functions.exampleen: Not even 007 from the Investigation Office saw it, but I was suspended for thirty days.

functions.example: Mi pare una formula migliore [piuttosto che procedere ora alle dichiarazioni di voto che ci porterebbero molto lontano].
functions.exampleen: It seems to me a better formula than to proceed now with the explanations of vote which would take us very far.

functions.example: Questo permette a ciascuna stazione di trasmettere direttamente al satellite, [piuttosto che pagare per un intero transponder].
functions.exampleen: This allows each station to broadcast directly to the satellite rather than paying for an entire transponder.

functions.example: Altri interpretano gli stessi versi come la testimonianza di una forte amicizia, [piuttosto che di un amore carnale].
functions.exampleen: Others interpret the same verses as a testimony of strong friendship rather than carnal love.

functions.example: Il debitore non può imputare il pagamento al capitale, [piuttosto che agli interessi e alle spese], senza il consenso del creditore.
functions.exampleen: The debtor cannot impute the payment to the principal, rather than to the interest and expenses, without the consent of the creditor.

functions.example: Al termine di tre giorni e tre notti di scontri, che hanno messo a ferro e fuoco alcuni quartieri della periferia di Hannover, il bilancio, non ancora definitivo, è di 168 poliziotti feriti, di cui 25-30 gravemente, più un numero imprecisato di feriti, presumibilmente ancora [più alto di quello degli agenti, fra i punk].
functions.exampleen: At the end of three days and three nights of clashes, which have set fire to some neighborhoods on the outskirts of Hanover, the toll, not yet final, is 168 policemen injured, of which 25-30 seriously, plus an unspecified number of injured, presumably even higher than that of agents, among the punks.

functions.example: In pubblico si spegneranno presto, gli avvenimenti di questi giorni - [l'arresto di Genaro Arriagada più la richiesta di amnistia generale avanzata a Bonn dal cardinal Sylva Enriquez alla Giunta militare] - hanno già spiazzato la Payita dalla prima pagina dei giornali.
functions.exampleen: In public, the events of recent days - the arrest of Genaro Arriagada plus the request for a general amnesty advanced in Bonn by Cardinal Sylva Enriquez to the military junta - have already displaced Payita from the front page of the newspapers.

functions.example: Tira un respiro profondo, lentamente, cercando di aprire [più che puoi] la gabbia toracica.
functions.exampleen: Take a deep breath, slowly, trying to open the rib cage as wide as you can.

functions.example: Michael [più di chiunque altro] ha la forza per superarlo.
functions.exampleen: Michael more than anyone else has the strength to overcome it.

functions.example: Questo campo si estende oltre le colline e anche [più in là].
functions.exampleen: This field extends beyond the hills and beyond.

functions.example: La Linea Yamanote ha un significato anche simbolico, [poiché visto dall'alto il percorso assume la forma di mano di Buddha, come a proteggere Tokyo].
functions.exampleen: The Yamanote Line also has a symbolic meaning, as seen from above, the path takes the shape of a Buddha's hand, as if to protect Tokyo.

functions.example: [Presso quale centro di ricerca] lavora l'oceanografo John Potter?
functions.exampleen: At which research center does oceanographer John Potter work?

functions.example: La legge assicura l'indipendenza dei giudici delle giurisdizioni speciali, del pubblico ministero [presso di esse], e degli estranei che partecipano all'amministrazione della giustizia.
functions.exampleen: The law ensures the independence of the judges of special jurisdictions, of the public prosecutor in them, and of outsiders who participate in the administration of justice.

functions.example: In queste sale maestose e lungo i corridoi sono ospitate molte tele di Karl Wilhelm Diefenbach (1815-1913), nato all'indomani del Congresso di Vienna e morto [prima che iniziasse la mattanza della grande guerra].
functions.exampleen: In these majestic rooms and along the corridors there are many paintings by Karl Wilhelm Diefenbach (1815-1913), born in the aftermath of the Congress of Vienna and died before the slaughter of the great war began.

functions.example: Pallucca , [prima del trapianto], aveva subito tre infarti e aveva quattro by-pass.
functions.exampleen: Pallucca, before the transplant, had suffered three heart attacks and had four by-passes.

functions.example: Questo accordo richiederà un vero sacrificio economico, ma gli ucraini sono disposti a pagarne il prezzo [pur di preservare la nostra indipendenza].
functions.exampleen: This agreement will require a real economic sacrifice, but the Ukrainians are willing to pay the price to preserve our independence.

functions.example: Il caso del cavallo, non trattato con cocaina, eccitanti e carburanti micidiali, ma solo curato con farmaci e antinfiammatori necessari, [pur se proibiti], è ulteriore stimolo per un approfondimento della questione.
functions.exampleen: The case of the horse, not treated with cocaine, exciting and deadly fuels, but only treated with necessary drugs and anti-inflammatories, even if prohibited, is a further stimulus for a deeper understanding of the question.

functions.example: Il proprietario di un fondo contiguo al muro altrui può chiederne la comunione, [purché lo faccia per tutta l'estensione della sua proprietà].
functions.exampleen: The owner of a property adjacent to another's wall can ask for communion, as long as he does so for the entire extent of his property.

functions.example: Il Papa cita la pedagoga Montessori [quale ideale portabandiera].
functions.exampleen: The Pope cites the Montessori pedagogue as the ideal standard-bearer.

functions.example: [Qualora si verifichi un mutamento nelle condizioni originarie], la derivazione può essere soppressa su istanza dell'una o dell'altra parte.
functions.exampleen: If there is a change in the original conditions, the derivation can be canceled at the request of either party.

functions.example: Bossi [quando parla] si copre di ridicolo.
functions.exampleen: When Bossi speaks, he is ridiculed.

functions.example: Illegalità e corruzione si sono infiltrate in tutti i settori della società e della classe politica, in un patto di tolleranza, [quando non di complicità], che ha retto fino a pochi mesi fa.
functions.exampleen: Illegality and corruption have infiltrated all sectors of society and the political class, in a pact of tolerance, if not of complicity, which it held until a few months ago.

functions.example: I partner libici pensavano di risolvere i problemi di approvvigionamento alimentare acquistando una fazenda in Brasile, [grande quanto mezza Italia].
functions.exampleen: The Libyan partners thought they could solve the food supply problems by buying a fazenda in Brazil, the size of half of Italy.

functions.example: Ma presto altri nudi, [tanto cattolici quanto laici], lo faranno dimenticare.
functions.exampleen: But soon other nudes, both Catholic and secular, will make us forget.

functions.example: [Quanto alle possibilità della Ferrari] occorrerà vedere come saranno i suoi assetti da gara.
functions.exampleen: As for Ferrari's possibilities, it will be necessary to see what its racing setups will be like.

functions.example: Non può opporgli la compensazione che avrebbe potuto opporre il debitore originario, [quantunque si sia verificata prima dell'espromissione].
functions.exampleen: He cannot oppose him with the compensation that the original debtor could have offered, even though it occurred before the expulsion.

functions.example: Era il quarto d'ora del secondo tempo iniziato in anticipo, [quasi ci fosse la fretta di chiudere la pratica e che non ci si pensasse più].
functions.exampleen: It was the quarter of an hour of the second half, which started early, as if there was a rush to close the case and no one thought about it anymore.

functions.example: [Le zanzare maschio non mordono quindi non rappresentano alcun rischio per la salute.]
functions.exampleen: Male mosquitoes do not bite so they pose no health risk.

functions.example: L'enfiteuta ha gli stessi diritti che avrebbe il proprietario sui frutti del fondo, sul tesoro e [relativamente alle utilizzazioni del sottosuolo] in conformità delle disposizioni delle leggi speciali.
functions.exampleen: The leaseholder has the same rights that the owner would have on the fruits of the estate, on the treasury and in relation to the use of the subsoil in accordance with the provisions of the special laws.

functions.example: Tuttavia, ora, il documento è andato perduto e gli studiosi non sono d'accordo [riguardo la sua autenticità].
functions.exampleen: However, now the document has been lost and scholars disagree as to its authenticity.

functions.example: Le norme armonizzate non dovrebbero avere lo scopo di fissare limiti [riguardo agli aspetti ambientali].
functions.exampleen: Harmonized standards should not aim to set limits on environmental aspects.

functions.example: La restituzione volontaria costituisce prova della liberazione anche [rispetto ai condebitori in solido].
functions.exampleen: Voluntary restitution constitutes proof of release also with respect to joint and several debtors.

functions.example: L'usufruttuario ha il diritto di conseguire il possesso della cosa di cui ha l'usufrutto, [salvo quanto è disposto dall'art].
functions.exampleen: The usufructuary has the right to obtain possession of the property of which he has the usufruct, without prejudice to the provisions of art.

functions.example: [Salvo che sia espressamente convenuto altrimenti per iscritto fra le parti], il Licenziante offre l'opera in licenza così com'è e non fornisce alcuna dichiarazione o garanzia di qualsiasi tipo con riguardo all'opera.
functions.exampleen: Unless otherwise expressly agreed in writing by the parties, the Licensor offers the licensed work as is and makes no representations or warranties of any kind with respect to the work.

functions.example: Poi, [se il governo non presenta un progetto di legge], credo sia giusto che lo facciano altre parti politiche.
functions.exampleen: Then, if the government does not present a bill, I think it is right for other political parties to do so.

functions.example: Non esiste altro meccanismo in questo gioco [se non che le noccioline finiscano in un accumulo sempre più grande di noccioline di polistirolo indigeste].
functions.exampleen: There is no other mechanism in this game other than that the peanuts end up in an ever larger accumulation of indigestible Styrofoam peanuts.

functions.example: [Sebbene il Centro di Ricerca non sia più coinvolto nel lancio di satelliti dal 1988], sono in corso due macro progetti.
functions.exampleen: Although the Research Center has no longer been involved in satellite launches since 1988, two macro projects are underway.

functions.example: La tecnologia impiegata è [più semplice di quella militare, sebbene spesso illegale].
functions.exampleen: The technology used is simpler than military, although often illegal.

functions.example: I lini si classificano [secondo il grado di finezza delle fibre].
functions.exampleen: Linens are classified according to the degree of fineness of the fibers.

functions.example: La presente convenzione si applica al trasporto effettuato dallo Stato o da altre persone giuridiche di diritto pubblico [sempreché ricorrano le condizioni di cui all'articolo 1].
functions.exampleen: This Convention applies to transport performed by the State or by other legal persons governed by public law provided the conditions set out in Article 1 are met.

functions.example: Tutto segua [senza danno] all'acquedotto.
functions.exampleen: Everything follows without damage to the aqueduct.

functions.example: Stefano Sallustri annega nel tratto di mare antistante la spiaggia [senza che nessuno si accorga di nulla].
functions.exampleen: Stefano Sallustri drowns in the stretch of sea in front of the beach without anyone noticing anything.

functions.example: [Senza di lui], loro non sono più niente.
functions.exampleen: Without him, they are nothing anymore.

functions.example: È giusto, [seppure inutile], dire che i governi devono biasimare soltanto se stessi per essersi lanciati in questa folle corsa in maniera così avventata.
functions.exampleen: It is fair, albeit useless, to say that governments should only blame themselves for launching into this mad rush so rashly.

functions.example: Giuseppe Rota, presidente dell'Unione Italiana, che rappresenta la minoranza [sia in Slovenia, sia in Croazia], ha smentito le voci.
functions.exampleen: Giuseppe Rota, president of the Italian Union, which represents the minority in both Slovenia and Croatia, denied the rumors.

functions.example: [Siccome siamo in democrazia], finché la gente lo vota lui può pure continuare a dire certe assurdità.
functions.exampleen: Since we are in a democracy, as long as people vote for him, he can continue to say certain nonsense.

functions.example: La cittadella monastica, munita [sin dalla fondazione trecentesca], fu poi ampliata sontuosamente nel corso del Seicento.
functions.exampleen: The monastic citadel, equipped since the fourteenth-century foundation, was then lavishly enlarged during the seventeenth century.

functions.example: L'imputato non è considerato colpevole [sino alla condanna definitiva].
functions.exampleen: The accused is not considered guilty until the final sentence.

functions.example: Ogni individuo accusato di un reato è presunto innocente [sino a che la sua colpevolezza non sia stata provata legalmente in un pubblico processo].
functions.exampleen: Any individual accused of a crime is presumed innocent until his guilt has been legally proven in a public trial.

functions.example: Ma l'opportunismo del presidente croato lo spinge a muoversi [solo e quando i suoi potenti protettori glielo consentono].
functions.exampleen: But the opportunism of the Croatian president pushes him to move only and when his powerful protectors allow him to.

functions.example: La stessa disposizione si applica se l'usufrutto è stabilito soltanto [sopra un edificio].
functions.exampleen: The same provision applies if the usufruct is established only on a building.

functions.example: Frizionale tutti i giorni e leviga la pelle, non più di una volta la settimana [sotto la doccia].
functions.exampleen: Use it every day and smooth the skin, no more than once a week in the shower.

functions.example: Sono venuti in due [su una macchina scura].
functions.exampleen: Two of them came in a dark car.

functions.example: La mostra si estende [su una superficie di 2500 metri quadri].
functions.exampleen: The exhibition covers an area of 2500 square meters.

functions.example: Chiediamo informazioni precise [su come usare l'henné sui capelli].
functions.exampleen: We ask for precise information on how to use henna on hair.

functions.example: E in un box si sono sfogati [su di lei].
functions.exampleen: And in a box they vented on her.

functions.example: E potrei anche morire, [tanto non me ne frega più niente].
functions.exampleen: And I might even die, I don't give a damn anymore.

functions.example: Chcąc sprawdzić, idzie [do Simony].

functions.example: Bandyci wsadzili ją w Szczecinku [do pociągu].

functions.example: [Do wieczora] sytuacja została całkowicie opanowana.

functions.example: [Do odwołania Wąsacza] potrzeba 231 głosów.
functions.exampleen: 231 votes are required [to dismiss Wasacz].

functions.example: Ale mijały lata, a [dokoła gdańskiego Ratusza] wciąż rozbrzmiewała obca mowa i obce pieśni.

functions.example: Będę głodować, [dopóki mi zdrowie pozwoli].

functions.example: [Dzięki archiwum] zachowały się kopie.
functions.exampleen: [Thanks to the archive], the copies have been preserved.

functions.example: Pacjent zgłosił się do szpitala, [gdy zaczął mu się pogarszać wzrok w lewym oku].

functions.example: A może, [gdybym się przemógł], potłumiłbym jej zaklęcia?

functions.example: Korzystał chętnie z tego, [gdyż otrzymywał piętnaście centów na kino].
functions.exampleen: He took advantage of it willingly, [receiving fifteen cents for the cinema].

functions.example: Rano po szóstej obudziłem się rześki [jak ptaszek].

functions.example: Gasi karbidówkę wilgotną dłonią, [jakby gasiła świecę].
functions.exampleen: She puts out the carbide with a wet hand, [as if she were putting out a candle].

functions.example: [Jako studentka resocjalizacji], nie bała się osób, które popadły w konflikt z prawem.
functions.exampleen: [As a student of rehabilitation], she was not afraid of people who fell into conflict with the law.

functions.example: [Jeśli dniówka ma ponad 8 godzin], mamy dostać nadgodziny.
functions.exampleen: [If the day's work is over 8 hours], we have to get overtime.

functions.example: [Jeżeli był to napalm], moje tenisówki przeżarłby w okamgnieniu.
functions.exampleen: [If it was napalm], it would have eaten my sneakers in no time.

functions.example: [Kiedy wyciągnęli Wandzię na brzeg], z ust wypłynęła jej piana.
functions.exampleen: [When they pulled Wanda ashore], foam spilled out of her mouth.

functions.example: Staję [koło stołu] i czekam.
functions.exampleen: I stand [by the table] and wait.

functions.example: [Koło dworca kolejowego] zaczepiło go dwóch Cyganów.
functions.exampleen: Two Gypsies accosted him [near the train station].

functions.example: Starcia zaczęły się [koło południa].

functions.example: Ale to nieprawda, nie ciążymy [ku Rosji].

functions.example: Trzeba się spieszyć, bo [lada moment] pojawią się posłowie IV kadencji.

functions.example: [Mimo gęstniejącego mroku], starowina nosił przeciwsłoneczne okulary.

functions.example: Chodzili [między regałami] i włożyli do koszyka aparat fotograficzny.

functions.example: Czyżby został [na przystanku]?

functions.example: Dawno minęliśmy wzgórze, [na którym] pożegnałem Cavalerra.

functions.example: Czy zaginiona głowa dziennikarza powróci [na swoje miejsce]?

functions.example: Dwaj turyści, Amerykanin i Niemiec, udali się [na początku tygodnia] na wycieczkę.

functions.example: Rozdają publiczne pieniądze [na rzecz Kościoła katolickiego], modlą się żarliwie przed kamerami, marzą o cenzurze obyczajowej.

functions.example: Jak podaje PAP, brak danych [na temat liczebności załogi].

functions.example: [Nad podwójnym łóżkiem] wisi niewielki obrazek w grubych ramach.

functions.example: Sejm debatował wczoraj [nad abolicją podatkową].

functions.example: Pokazano jej lichą zagrodę, [naprzeciw wiejskiego cmentarza].

functions.exampleen: The tragedy happened on Monday evening in Reda, [near Gdynia].

functions.example: Ale ja mówię [o codzienności].
